thread.section_title: LendingTree Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LendingTree | www.lendingtree.com | 6 of 247
thread.title: TP

author: TP
title: TP
text: This loan was pretty simple to apply for. It was approved quickly. There was a delay in receiving the funds into my account for which I didn't understand the necessity of that process because it amounted to a call from a representative that verified my name and one other item. After that, it was sent to financing to release the fund. That took another couple of days. Other than that, it was really a good company to work with.
